lead_paragraph: Weldon Kirui of Kenya pulled away late and won the Los Angeles Marathon in 2 hours 13 minutes 7 seconds. Kirui finished second in 2012 and fourth in 2013.

headline.main: Kenyan Wins in Los Angeles Marathon

snippet: Weldon Kirui of Kenya pulled away late and won the Los Angeles Marathon in 2 hours 13 minutes 7 seconds. Kirui finished second in 2012 and fourth in 2013.
abstract: Kenyan Weldon Kirui wins Los Angeles Marathon in 2 hours 13 minutes 7 seconds.
